name: How To Become A Demon
description:
Game made for https://itch.io/jam/openfun-game-jam-1

Description:

Random labyrinth, with random encounters (only 2 in the project), random weapons only at the begining of the game (i had a bigger idea with this weapon randomization, well ... ). 

It's not a funny game to play. But to make it .. i had unlimited fun.

Keys:

WASD - move

1 - pick up / throw

2 - recall

3 - drop

Spoiler: check up the chest before exploring.

The mob will die on recalling the weapon, not by throwing on it.
